Issue.creator: jonathanlevi
Issue.summary: Golang SDK: intkey_go example: "index out of bound" panic when endpoint is not specified
Issue.description: 0 { endpoint = os.Args 1 } prefix := intkey.Hexdigest("intkey") :6 handler := intkey.NewIntkeyHandler(prefix) processor := processor.NewTransactionProcessor(endpoint) processor.AddHandler(handler) processor.Start() } {quote} In particular, it panics when "main" is called without the endpoint argument/parameter, this block https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/blob/d40720ec3659c431df6cd5a132c801ada3ceb4aa/sdk/examples/intkey_go/src/sawtooth_intkey/main.go#L11 results in an "index out of bound" panic. >
